016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.ca;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.spi.CertificatesProvider;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStores;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStoresConfiguration;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.Secrets;
023import jakarta.inject.Inject;
024import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
025import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
026import org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Encodable;
027import org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1ObjectIdentifier;
028import org.bouncycastle.asn1.DERSequence;
029import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x500.X500Name;
030import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.*;
031import org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder;
032import org.bouncycastle.cert.X509v2CRLBuilder;
033import org.bouncycastle.cert.X509v3CertificateBuilder;
034import org.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce.JcaX509CRLConverter;
035import org.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce.JcaX509CertificateConverter;
036import org.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce.JcaX509ExtensionUtils;
037import org.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce.JcaX509v2CRLBuilder;
038import org.bouncycastle.openssl.PEMParser;
039import org.bouncycastle.operator.ContentSigner;
040import org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException;
041import org.bouncycastle.operator.jcajce.JcaContentSignerBuilder;
042import org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequest;
043import org.bouncycastle.util.io.pem.PemObject;
044import org.bouncycastle.util.io.pem.PemWriter;
045import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
046import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
047
048import java.io.IOException;
049import java.io.StringWriter;
050import java.math.BigInteger;
051import java.security.*;
052import java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException;
053import java.security.cert.X509CRL;
054import java.security.cert.X509Certificate;
055import java.time.Clock;
056import java.time.LocalDateTime;
057import java.time.ZoneOffset;
058import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
059import java.time.temporal.ChronoField;
060import java.util.ArrayList;
061import java.util.Date;
062import java.util.List;
063import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
064import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
065
066import static org.bouncycastle.jce.provider.BouncyCastleProvider.PROVIDER_NAME;
067
068
069@Service(name = "intermediateca")
070@ContractsProvided({CertificatesProvider.class, IntermediateCACertificatesProvider.class})
071public class IntermediateCACertificatesProvider
072        implements CertificatesProvider {
073
074    private static final String KEYSTORE_NAME = "castore";
075
076    private final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
077
078    private final IntermediateCaConfiguration intermediateCaConfiguration;
079    private final KeyStore intermediateCaKeyStore;
080    private final KeyStore trustStore;
081    private final JcaX509ExtensionUtils issuedCertExtUtils;
082    private final String caCertAlias;
083    private final JcaX509CertificateConverter certificateConverter = new JcaX509CertificateConverter().setProvider(PROVIDER_NAME);
084    private final KeyStoresConfiguration keyStoresConfiguration;
085    private final KeyStores keyStores;
086    private final Secrets secrets;
087
088    @Inject
089    public IntermediateCACertificatesProvider(Configuration configuration, KeyStores keyStores, Secrets secrets) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException {
090        intermediateCaConfiguration = new IntermediateCaConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("intermediateca"));
091        intermediateCaKeyStore = keyStores.getKeyStore(KEYSTORE_NAME);
092        trustStore = keyStores.getKeyStore("truststore");
093        keyStoresConfiguration = new KeyStoresConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("keystores"));
094        this.keyStores = keyStores;
095        this.secrets = secrets;
096
097        issuedCertExtUtils = new JcaX509ExtensionUtils();
098        caCertAlias = intermediateCaConfiguration.getAlias();
099    }
100
101    @Override
102    public CompletionStage<List<X509Certificate>> requestCertificates(PKCS10CertificationRequest csr) {
103        try {
104            X500Name issuedCertSubject = csr.getSubject();
105            ZonedDateTime now = ZonedDateTime.now();
106            ZonedDateTime validFrom = now.minusDays(1); // backdated to protect against clock skew and misconfigurations
107            ZonedDateTime expiryDate = now.plus(intermediateCaConfiguration.getValidity());
108            X509Certificate serviceCaCert = (X509Certificate) intermediateCaKeyStore.getCertificate(caCertAlias);
109            BigInteger issuedCertSerialNum = new BigInteger(Long.toString(System.currentTimeMillis()));
110            X500Name issuerName = X500Name.getInstance(serviceCaCert.getSubjectX500Principal().getEncoded());
111            X509v3CertificateBuilder issuedCertBuilder = new X509v3CertificateBuilder(issuerName, issuedCertSerialNum, Date.from(validFrom.toInstant()), Date.from(expiryDate.toInstant()), issuedCertSubject, csr.getSubjectPublicKeyInfo());
112
113            // Add Extensions
114            // Use BasicConstraints to say that this Cert is not a CA
115            issuedCertBuilder.addExtension(Extension.basicConstraints, true, new BasicConstraints(false));
116
117            // Add Issuer cert identifier as Extension
118            issuedCertBuilder.addExtension(Extension.authorityKeyIdentifier, false,
119                    issuedCertExtUtils.createAuthorityKeyIdentifier(serviceCaCert.getPublicKey(),
120                            GeneralNames.getInstance(new DERSequence(new GeneralName(issuerName))), serviceCaCert.getSerialNumber()));
121            issuedCertBuilder.addExtension(Extension.subjectKeyIdentifier, false, issuedCertExtUtils.createSubjectKeyIdentifier(serviceCaCert.getPublicKey()));
122
123            for (ASN1ObjectIdentifier extensionOID : csr.getRequestedExtensions().getExtensionOIDs()) {
124                logger.debug("Copying {} from CSR into cert", extensionOID.toString());
125                if (extensionOID != Extension.subjectAlternativeName) {
126                    issuedCertBuilder.addExtension(csr.getRequestedExtensions().getExtension(extensionOID));
127                }
128            }
129
130            // Add localhost, IP, and DNS names to be used for SSL
131            List<GeneralName> names = new ArrayList<>();
132
133            names.add(new GeneralName(GeneralName.dNSName, csr.getSubject().getRDNs()[0].getFirst().getValue().toString()));
134            names.add(new GeneralName(GeneralName.dNSName, "localhost"));
135            names.add(new GeneralName(GeneralName.iPAddress, "127.0.0.1"));
136
137            Extension san = csr.getRequestedExtensions().getExtension(Extension.subjectAlternativeName);
138            if (san != null) {
139                GeneralNames generalNames = GeneralNames.getInstance(san.getExtnValue().getOctets());
140
141                for (GeneralName name : generalNames.getNames()) {
142                    if (name.getTagNo() == GeneralName.dNSName) {
143                        names.add(name);
144                    } else if (name.getTagNo() == GeneralName.iPAddress) {
145                        names.add(name);
146                    }
147                }
148            }
149
150            issuedCertBuilder.addExtension(Extension.subjectAlternativeName, false, new DERSequence(names.toArray(new ASN1Encodable[1])));
151
152            JcaContentSignerBuilder csrBuilder = new JcaContentSignerBuilder("SHA256withECDSA").setProvider(PROVIDER_NAME);
153            char[] password = keyStoresConfiguration.getKeyStoreConfiguration("ssl").getPassword()
154                    .map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null);
155            ContentSigner csrContentSigner = csrBuilder.build((PrivateKey) intermediateCaKeyStore.getKey(caCertAlias, password));
156            X509CertificateHolder issuedCertHolder = issuedCertBuilder.build(csrContentSigner);
157
158            // Create trust chain
159            List<X509Certificate> certChain = new ArrayList<>();
160            certChain.add(certificateConverter.getCertificate(issuedCertHolder));
161            certChain.add((X509Certificate) intermediateCaKeyStore.getCertificate(caCertAlias));
162            certChain.add((X509Certificate) trustStore.getCertificate("root"));
163
164            return CompletableFuture.completedStage(certChain);
165        } catch (Throwable throwable) {
166            return CompletableFuture.failedStage(throwable);
167        }
168    }
169
170    public byte[] getRootCertificate() throws KeyStoreException, CertificateEncodingException {
171        return intermediateCaKeyStore.getCertificate("root").getEncoded();
172    }
173
174    public String getCRL() throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException, OperatorCreationException {
175        StringWriter stringWriter = new StringWriter();
176
177        {
178            X509Certificate signingCert = (X509Certificate) intermediateCaKeyStore.getCertificate(caCertAlias);
179            char[] password = keyStoresConfiguration.getKeyStoreConfiguration(KEYSTORE_NAME).getPassword()
180                    .map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null);
181            X509CRL crl = createEmptyCRL((PrivateKey) intermediateCaKeyStore.getKey(caCertAlias, password), signingCert);
182
183            PemWriter pWrt = new PemWriter(stringWriter);
184            pWrt.writeObject(new PemObject(PEMParser.TYPE_X509_CRL, crl.getEncoded()));
185            pWrt.close();
186        }
187
188        // See if we have the rootstore as well, and append it
189        try {
190            KeyStore rootStore = keyStores.getKeyStore("rootstore");
191
192            X509Certificate signingCert = (X509Certificate) rootStore.getCertificate("root");
193            char[] password = keyStoresConfiguration.getKeyStoreConfiguration("rootstore").getPassword()
194                    .map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null);
195            X509CRL crl = createEmptyCRL((PrivateKey) rootStore.getKey("root", password), signingCert);
196            PemWriter pWrt = new PemWriter(stringWriter);
197            pWrt.writeObject(new PemObject(PEMParser.TYPE_X509_CRL, crl.getEncoded()));
198            pWrt.close();
199        } catch (RuntimeException exception) {
200            // Ignore
201        }
202
203        return stringWriter.toString();
204    }
205
206
207    private X509CRL createEmptyCRL(
208            PrivateKey caKey,
209            X509Certificate caCert)
210            throws IOException, GeneralSecurityException, OperatorCreationException {
211        LocalDateTime now = LocalDateTime.now(Clock.systemUTC());
212        Date nowDate = new Date(now.toInstant(ZoneOffset.UTC).toEpochMilli());
213        X509v2CRLBuilder crlGen = new JcaX509v2CRLBuilder(caCert.getSubjectX500Principal(), nowDate);
214
215        Date nextMilleniumDate = new Date(now.plus(1000, ChronoField.YEAR.getBaseUnit()).toInstant(ZoneOffset.UTC).toEpochMilli());
216        crlGen.setNextUpdate(nextMilleniumDate);
217
218        // add extensions to CRL
219        JcaX509ExtensionUtils extUtils = new JcaX509ExtensionUtils();
220
221        crlGen.addExtension(Extension.authorityKeyIdentifier, false,
222                extUtils.createAuthorityKeyIdentifier(caCert));
223
224        ContentSigner signer = new JcaContentSignerBuilder("SHA256withECDSA")
225                .setProvider("BC").build(caKey);
226
227        JcaX509CRLConverter converter = new JcaX509CRLConverter().setProvider("BC");
228
229        return converter.getCRL(crlGen.build(signer));
230    }
231}
